casebody.data:
The KIMBERLEY RICE KAESTNER 1992 FAMILY TRUST
v.
N.C. DEPARTMENT OF REVENUE 307PA15-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 24, 2017 Peggy S. Vincent, Assistant Attorney General, Tenisha S. Jacobs, Assistant Attorney General, Matthew Sawchak, Solicitor General, James W. Doggett, Deputy Solicitor General, for North Carolina Department of Revenue. Thomas D. Myrick, Attorney at Law, Neil T. Bloomfield, Attorney at Law, Kara N. Bitar, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Robert F. Orr, Attorney at Law, Asheville, for The Kimberley Rice Kaestner 1992 Family Trust.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 23rd of March 2017 by Plaintiff:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of March 2017."

Plaintiff shall have up to and including the 11th day of May 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
